Republican politician Vivek Ramaswamy said it's not about Joe Biden or Kamala Harris but the deep state that controls both of them as Kamala Harris' low IQ represents the same thing as Joe Biden's cognitive decline. "It's not a bug, but a 'feature' for the people who control them," Vivek Ramaswamy said "The people we elect to run the government...they are not the ones who actually run the government.
As the morale is drooping in Joe Biden's campaign with many prominent Democrats withdrawing support from Biden, the chair of the campaign Jen O'Malley Dillon has sternly asked the staff to tune our "crazy f***ing gossip land world", according to an audio recording of an all-hand call, reported by Axios. In the call, the chair said the last two weeks had been vert very bad.
According to a recent article in Bloomberg, the chief ministers of Andhra Pradesh and Bihar, Chandrababu Naidu and Nitish Kumar, are applying strong pressure on the Narendra Modi government over financial demands of $12bn (₹1 lakh crore) and $3.6bn (₹30,000 crore), respectively, for their states. Naidu’s 16 Lok Sabha seats and Nitish’s 12 seats .
India's growing employment stems largely from self-employed individuals, unpaid workers and temporary farm hires, whose jobs are not equivalent to formal positions with regular wages, private sector economists said on July 10. The comments follow labour department figures released this week showing more than "8 crore employment opportunities created from 2017-18 to 2021-22", according to its press release. That translates to an average of 2 crore (20 million) new (8.8 million) jobs were added each year since 2012.

Melania Trump is planning to attend the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee next week after her role in husband Donald Trump's presidential bid remained shrouded in mystery. Donald Trump will be officially announced as the party's presidential candidate at the convention. It is not clear whether Melania will speak onstage or be a formal part of the convention program.
